content:
This file seems to be imported only in Mathlib.lean and in Mathlib/Tactic.lean. Is it meant to stay, or is it leftover from some now-obsolete part of fun_prop?

cc @Tomas Skrivan
Looks like AEMeasurable is now marked with fun_prop at its definition so this file is obsolete.
This file used to have lemmas about fun_prop and AEMeasurable: I mostly emptied that file (the file's history has the PR number), and left two tiny things which I wasn't fully sure how to deal with.
Basically, that file only records two small TODOs now. Adressing these and deleting the file sounds fine!
Ha I'm not even the right person to ask anymore :)
